entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 19.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Temperature: 19.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 15.7°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning. High 31. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
